content.question: A race car of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> is moving with speed <math alttext="v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> on a straight road. It then accelerates in the direction of its motion at a constant rate <math alttext="a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>a</mi></math> for an amount of time <math alttext="delta t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></math>. Which of the following expressions is equal to the magnitude of the impulse delivered to the car during this time?

choices.label: <math alttext="m a delta t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi><mi>a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></math>

<math alttext="m times, open parenthesis, v sub 0, end sub, plus a delta t, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="v sub 0, end sub, times delta t, plus one half a, times open parenthesis, delta t, close parenthesis, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>a</mi><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="m a delta t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi><mi>a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
